## SentEthersTransaction.getReceipt() method

Check whether the transaction has been mined, and whether it was successful.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getReceipt(): Promise<ProtocolReceipt<EthersTransactionReceipt, T>>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[ProtocolReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-base.protocolreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionReceipt](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.etherstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Unlike [waitForReceipt()](./stablecoin-lib-base.sentprotocoltransaction.waitforreceipt.md)<!-- -->, this function doesn't wait for the transaction to be mined.
